SMS

Class Connection15

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezjcom.JComObject
      • SMS.Connection15

  • public class Connection15
extends JComObject
    This class corresponds to a COM interface. Objects of this class are not created directly, but are obtained by calling methods of other COM objects.
